entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
I need to return a VeloBand Pulse. It's not working right and I'm extremely frustrated. I’ve barely had it!
I understand your frustration. I'm happy to help process a return for your VeloBand Pulse. Can you provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's order number #VF12345. And hurry up, I don't have all day.

Thank you. I have located your order. I see here you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date 15 days ago]. Our standard return policy is 90 days for most items, so you're well within that window. I am very sorry that your smart watch isn't working. We want to resolve this as quickly as possible.
90 days? Okay, that's good to hear at least. I was worried I was going to be stuck with this thing.

Yes, absolutely. To initiate the return, I'll send you a prepaid shipping label via email. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process a full refund to your original payment method.
And how long will that take?

Once we receive the VeloBand Pulse at our returns center, please allow approximately 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect in your account. You will receive a confirmation email when the refund has been processed. We value you as a customer.
Okay, 7-10 days. That's acceptable. So, I don’t need to speak with a manager or anything? I just send it back and get my money?

That's correct. No need to speak with a manager. You are well within our return policy. As long as the item is returned in a reasonable condition, you'll receive a full refund. This VeloBand Pulse is approved for return. The information about our return policy is on our website, if you would like further details. However, for most items it is 90 days. However, some promotional items can have a shorter return policy, usually of 10 days. Please ensure that it is returned within the timeframe to secure a full refund. Can I help you with anything else today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you for your help. I appreciate you making this so easy!
You're very welcome! We are glad we could help resolve this for you. Have a great day and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
